pavo: Perceptual Analysis, Visualization and Organization of Spectral Colour Data

Source: R/pavo-package.R
pavo-package.Rd

A cohesive framework for parsing, analyzing and organizing colour from spectral data.

See also

Useful links:

  • http://pavo.colrverse.com

  • https://github.com/rmaia/pavo/
